title: Brutalizer 2nd item
body:
Now that {{item:3071}}  is {{item:3044}} +{{item:3067}}  I think there needs to be a new Brutalizer item.

Riot should consider changing Essence Reaver to something people would build.
Like {{item:3134}} +{{item:1053}}  and lowering the AD to like 50 but giving it +10 armour pen.

OR maybe change {{item:3172}} a little bit. {{item:3134}} +{{item:3101}}. Kinda like a Youmuus but slightly more expensive but has tenacity and 20% cdr
